attributes.action: implement a total ban onoutdoor barbecues as they create a health hazard caused by secondary smoke from fumes blown into neighbouring premises and by undercooked dead animals being eaten to make people poorly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Barbecues are the work of the devil. They are horrid and smelly and make people cough.
They increase ill-health problems by as much as 100% due to the noxious fumes they blow into neighbouring premises and the lack of skill in cooking dead animals properly.
They are far worse than tobacco smoke and the impact is immediate, the animals are killed and then eaten by people who have no consideration for the lovely creatures on the earth.
